primary_type.title: Primary dither pattern type
primary_type.description: NIRISS primary dither pattern type. When NIRISS is the only instrument operating, possible values are AMI, IMAGING, MIMF, and WFSS. When NIRISS WFSS is prime with MIRI imaging in parallel, possible values follow the syntax NIS-MIR<nnn>-#, where <nnn> is the 3-digit value corresponding to the central wavelength of the MIRI filter in use (e.g. 077, 128, 150, 255) and # is the number of dither points (2, 3, 4, 9). When NIRISS WFSS is prime with NIRCam imaging in parallel, the format of possible values is NIS-NRC-#<s>, where # is the number of dither points (2, 3, 4, 9) and <s> is the size of the pattern (S, M, L). When NIRISS external calibration is prime with FGS external calibration in parallel, possible values are the same as when NIRISS is the only instrument operating.
primary_type.misc: IMAGING dithers coming with JSOCINT-124 for cycle 2, which states that imaging dithers will be like WFSS

primary_points.title: Number of points in primary dither pattern
primary_points.description: Number of points in NIRISS primary dither pattern for the AMI pattern type. Possible values are: 1, 2, 3, 4.

subpixel_total_points.title: Number of points in subpixel dither pattern
subpixel_total_points.description: Number of subpixel positions for NIRISS AMI pattern type. Possible values are: 1, 5, 9, 25.

dither_points.title: Number of points in direct image dither pattern
dither_points.description: The NIRISS direct image dither number of points. This field is used when pattern type is WFSS, IMAGING, or MIMF. When NIRISS is the only instrument, possible values are: 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12, 16. When NIRISS WFSS is primary with NIRCam Imaging or MIRI Imaging in parallel, 9 is an additional possible value.

pattern_size.title: Primary dither pattern size
pattern_size.description: NIRISS dither pattern size indicates the dither point distribution for WFSS and IMAGE pattern types. Possible values are SMALL, MEDIUM, and LARGE.

primary_dither_type.title: Primary dither points and packing
primary_dither_type.description: NIRCam primary dither specification with number of points and possible point packing, included when a NIRISS dither is in parallel with NIRCam (Imaging or WFSS). In NIRCam Imaging/NIRISS Imaging and NIRCam Imaging/NIRISS WFSS dithers, all the enum values, except 1, apply. NIRCam WFSS/NIRISS Imaging dithers can only have integer values of 1-16.
primary_dither_type.misc: for NIRCam Imaging/NIRISS Imaging, NIRCam Imaging/NIRISS WFSS, and NIRCam WFSS/NIRISS Imaging dithers; set by SDP to dms_dithers_view.primary_dithers for NIRCam

subpixel_pattern.title: Subpixel dither pattern type
subpixel_pattern.description: NIRCam subpixel dither pattern type, included when a NIRISS dither is in parallel with NIRCam. All instances include values in the format #_POINT_<SMALL|MEDIUM|LARGE>_WITH_NIRISSR, where # is the number of subpixel dither points. In NIRCam Imaging/NIRISS Imaging and NIRCam Imaging/NIRISS WFSS dithers, NIRCAM_ONLY is also possible. In NIRCam WFSS/NIRISS Imaging dithers, additional values are 2-POINT, 4-POINT, 9-POINT, and NONE.
subpixel_pattern.misc: for NIRCam Imaging/NIRISS Imaging, NIRCam Imaging/NIRISS WFSS, and NIRCam WFSS/NIRISS Imaging dithers; set by SDP to dms_dithers_view.subpixel_dither_type|pps_to_scsb_translation| for NIRCam
